bulletpoints: Successfully collaborated with a cross-functional team to develop an online ordering platform for graphic designs, using Next.js, MongoDB, and JavaScript, significantly streamlining the design request process and enhancing user experience.
Played a pivotal role in the documentation process by creating comprehensive technical specifications and user manuals, ensuring clarity and usability for end-users and developers.
Actively participated in brainstorming sessions, contributing innovative ideas for new features and improvements.
Utilized languages such as Python, Typescript and JavaScript to develop back-end and front-end components of applications.
Engineered scalable REST APIs using Node.js and Express, enabling seamless integration with external services and accommodating a 50% increase in user traffic without performance degradation.
Proactively identified and resolved critical production issues, reducing downtime by 75% and improving system reliability during peak usage periods.
Collaborated with the design team to refactor and enhance the user interface, resulting in a 20% increase in user engagement.
